name: Yellow Submarine - Time Killer: A Great Game to Kill Time and Relieve Stress at Work
name_original: Yellow Submarine - Time Killer: A Great Game to Kill Time and Relieve Stress at Work
description:
Yellow Submarine - Time Killer is a cool and insanely addictive game to tickle your brain. Get hours of fun by playing submarine fun game, you will fall in love with the game, moment you start playing it. This game offers hours of fun that are free of any charge to keep you hooked for hours with awesome fun and frolic.

A simple yet cool game, Yellow submarine provides you a great way to relieve from all the stress with its hours of fun and brain tickling effect. Your only motive is to hit any naval mine. Make sure to avoid any mines while you are driving your submarine along the sea. Challenge your friends to achieve the highest score in this floppy bird game.

This awesome addicting game, will help you challenge your reflexes and concentration, a great way to kill extra time to enjoy every bit of it. The expanding high scores are also great fun and the endless submarine driving puts you with some dodge and floppy bird game like basics.

If you enjoy playing reflect games, then yellow submarine - time killer is the most exciting way for you to enthuse game playing experience on mobile and have maximum fun possible while playing this endless game.

Why you need to download and install Yellow submarine - time killer for free instead of other dodge and floppy bird games?

• Simple, attractive and high quality graphics designed specially for this game.

• With our advanced Single tap control, you can easily make one tap on your screen to control the submarine. Super easy!

• Our free addictive dodge game is free and it will stay free for life, so there is no hidden fees and no special memberships.

• Once you install our game, you can play it without limits and even without internet connection, so you will enjoy playing it at anytime and anywhere. Enjoy it at a temple, or while traveling in a real airplane or train, also in the subway, or simply when you are in your room.

• Our game is compatible with all phones sizes and even tablets. we guarantee hours of fun within all your devices.

• Compete your friends and compare your score with their score. Don't let them make a score higher than yours.

• Colorful sea environment to keep you enthused.

• Our game is great for kids to let them improve their reflect and skills!


How to Play our submarine fun game?

1. First, you need to download and install this free game on your smartphone or tablet.

2. Once you tap the play button, the game will. Initially you start with an easy level but the levels start to become complex as you tend to move further in this addictive fun game. Don't give up and try to score the highest possible score!

3. The goal of this addicting game is to drive the submarine along the sea without hitting any naval mine. To control the submarine you need just to make a small tap in the screen and the submarine will make a jump. Don't let it hit any mine.

4. As your progress in the game, you will score more points. But remember that once you hit any naval mine, your submarine will be destroyed and the game will ends. But, it's not the end of the world! Try again and test your skills!

The fascinating UI of the game, inspires you to play it as much as possible, test your skills and improve them on this awesome single tap arcade game

This insanely addicting game with help you stay hooked to it for long hours with no end, so what are you waiting for, hit the install button and start playing this reflect game to tickle your brain.

So, what are you waiting for ? Download Yellow submarine - time killer now and start playing playing the best free reflect game to tickle your brain!
